channel.title: [PI] adding monsters to drop list
channel.description: 've just added dungeoneering to my server, and I'm trying to make it so that each boss I kill drops a certain amount of tokens and they key needed for the next portal. I went into my NPCDrops.TSM and wrote this at the bottom: Code: [Select] #Bouncer 296:100 2478:5 275:1 I compiled with no errors but after running My server I was given this error: java.util.NoSuchElementException: No Line found at java.util.Scanner.nextLine(Scanner.java:1516) at Server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.LoadDrops(NPCDrops.java:37) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init>(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.<clinit>(server.java:70) [6/4/11 2:23 AM]: Launching Torvapkz in 3... 3... 1... Starting...Now! [6/4/11 2:23 AM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594 Help is much appreciated.

item.title: [PI] adding monsters to drop list
item.dc:creator: @tztk tztk
item.description:
@tztk wrote:

've just added dungeoneering to my server, and I’m trying to make it so that each boss I kill drops a certain amount of tokens and they key needed for the next portal. I went into my NPCDrops.TSM and wrote this at the bottom:
Code: [Select]
#Bouncer
296:100 2478:5 275:1
I compiled with no errors but after running My server I was given this error:
java.util.NoSuchElementException: No Line found
at java.util.Scanner.nextLine(Scanner.java:1516)
at Server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.LoadDrops(NPCDrops.java:37)
at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.(NPCDrops.java:15)
at server.Server.(server.java:70)
[6/4/11 2:23 AM]: Launching Torvapkz in 3… 3… 1… Starting…Now!
[6/4/11 2:23 AM]: Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:43594
Help is much appreciated.

Read full topic
